message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Could you meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! However, I'm afraid I can't quite meet you at $90. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make at least $110 to make it worth my while.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $100? It's the highest I can go.
